title: GeForce Now adds support for 4K streaming on Windows and macOS
content:
A couple of years after its debut, Nvidia GeForce Now is finally expanding its streaming options on PC and Mac. Starting today, GeForce Now supports 4K streaming on Windows and macOS.

moreâ€¦

The post GeForce Now adds support for 4K streaming on Windows and macOS appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Available now, Nvidia GeForce Now has made 4K cloud gaming available on Windows and macOS as a part of the 3080 tier.
